english.segment1: Twisting, turning, I beat my fist against my chest, Stretching, burning, I rage against the ugliness, Shake me, break me, Make me into something free, Make me complete, 'cause this is where I want to be.
english.segment2: I wanna be where he abounds, I wanna be where he abounds.
english.segment3: Bleeding, burning, We're sharing in your death daily, We choose to learn, We set no stones for stumbling, Shake me, break me, Make me into something free, Make me complete for you.
english.segment4: I wanna be where he abounds, I wanna be where he abounds. I wanna be where he abounds, (I wanna show you, I wanna know you, I wanna show how much I care). I wanna be where he abounds. (I wanna show you, I wanna know you, I wanna show how much I care)
english.segment5: Searching for truth, Searching for you, Searching for truth, Searching for you.
english.segment6: Wash me away, I wanna be where he abounds, Wash me away, I wanna be where he abounds, (I wanna show you, I wanna know you, I wanna show how much I care). I wanna be where he abounds. (I wanna show you, I wanna know you, I wanna show how much I care)
